start.text: I hope I'll get paid extra for this, I could use an extra set of eyes I guess...
I didn't train for this stuff...
I think I'm going to throw up...
I can't stop my tail from twitching...
I was meant to be at Revitalization Centre today, not here!

start_boss.text: Let me out! LET ME OUT!!!
I didn't sign up for this! I did not! Screw all of you!

engaged.text: Engaging the enemy. Hope they don't fire back...
Alright, alright, time to prove myself.
All those combat genemods should finally be of actual use now...

retreat.text: I don't know which one that is, but some instinct is telling me it's time to run!
Whatever genemod is making me run right now, I'm very grateful to you!

out_of_missiles.text: Missiles out. I knew I should've brought more.
Goddarnit, why haven't we taken more missiles?!

need_help.text: Help! Please, anyone, help me! I mean us! The crew!
Can't promise I won't scratch someone's face off from stress right now, help!

pursuing.text: I... I can't stop thinking about chasing them down like some prey...
I think I've never been so excited before. It's weird, but... Feels good?
My pupils are dilated. I feel so focused all of a sudden...
Why do I feel like pouncing on someone right now. Huh.

running.text: Gotta get back, GOTTA GET BACK!!!
Why do I feel like hiding in some burrow right now?!

hull_90.text: All this stress is bad for my feathers!
I didn't mean you no harm! I think...
The enemy is shooting back, no one told me they would be shooting back!

hull_50.text: Hull is at 50%! Help is needed, NOW!!!
I shouldn't have been here, I shouldn't have been here!
Is this some xenofauna instinct making me scared or are we really in trouble?!
Hull down to 50%! Someone, help, please!

hull_30.text: No-no-no-no, please, I don't want to die!
Hull at 30%! We're about to die here, help, I beg of you!
This is bad, this is really really bad!
Hull at only a third! There are dead people in the bridge! I've scratched myself to blood with my own claws, A-A-A-A-AH!!!
So that's what mice feel when cornered by a cat... Ha-a-a...

overload.text: Oh-no-no-no... This isn't good. Isn't good at all!
ALl this static is making my hair and fur stand up!

death.text: I haven't even paid out the loans for all these genemods...-
Well, it was fun, I guess...-
Should've got myself a chitine exoskeleton...-

victory.text: I did good! I think I did. Please, tell me I did.
That was fun! But I'd still prefer to never experience any of this again, thank you very much.
Think I need some genemods for extra courage...
Is it just me or did my fur turn gray in places...
I think I need to lay down for a bit...
